title: Pokedex
description: Pok√©dex App, is an app that can search and display information of pokemon, the information is obtained from the poke API API. This web app is created using Redux, React, React-router-dom and Axios, the app was created and worked together by two people for both styles and functionality.

title: Rick And Morty
description: Web App created with React, Axios and React-router-dom, the app was created and worked together by two people for both styles and functionality. The app can search, display information of the characters in their dimension in the animated series Rick and Morty using the Rick and Morty API, randomly gives locations, some worlds have no citizens.

title: Weather App
description: Web App created with React and Axios. The app makes requests for the location and to be able to obtain the weather of the weather where it is, the app consumes from the weather api.

title: Quote
description: Web App created with React. The app gives quotes randomly just like the color.

title: Box Shadow Generator
description: Web App created with HTML, CSS and pure JavaScript. The app generates the style for both the box, the shadow and the background. You can give the color to the box, size and border. Shadow displacement, size, color. Give a color to the background, the app supports both rgba and the integrated color palette.

title: E-commerce
description: App created with React, Axios, React-router-dom, Redux and Bootstrap. The app can create users, log in, log out, remove products from the cart, add the necessary amount to the cart and view the list of purchases made.
